resources.string:
You have launched a OpenVK Legacy FOSS client that ONLY works with OpenVK instances, an open source network that is not compatible with VKontakte / VK.

Please log in ONLY to the registered OpenVK account in one of the existing instances.
Please enter the code from the image
An error occurred while uploading. Retry?
An error occurred while trying to log in. Please check your login and password and try again.
To ensure a HTTPS connection, the device must be enabled. "Secure connection" setting. Enable?\r\n\r\nWARNING! It may not work on older devices.
You cannot log in to your account because your page has been blocked. If you think an error has occurred, please contact support.
You cannot send a message to this user due to their privacy settings.
Cannot load data. Please check your network connection.
Disabling images significantly decreases amount of transferred data.
If your device has an LED indicator for incoming notifications
Are you sure you want to delete this post?
There are no comments, but you can send your own.
Do you want to add %s as a friend?
Do you want to add %s as a friend?
%s received your friendship request and will confirm that you are a friend.
%s received your friendship request and will confirm that you are a friend.
The request has already been sent.
The audio file has been added to your page
The photo has been saved to the Device Memory
This file type is not supported
Add all of your OpenVK friends to contacts
Only add info for friends that already are in your contacts
Do you want to add your OpenVK friends\' info and pictures to your phone contacts?
The filter hides posts containing NSFW content
Logging out will delete all data related to this account from this device. Continue?
You\'re not logged in. Tap here to log in.
The audio file has been removed from your page
Are you sure you want to delete this album along with all photos and comments? This action can not be undone.
Nobody is tagged in this photo
Are you sure you want to remove %s from your friend list?
%s has been removed from your friend list
%s has been removed from your friend list
%s has been removed from your friend list
Failed to connect to the instance for unknown reasons. Please try again later or choose another instance.
This instance is currently unavailable. Please try again later or choose another instance.
The specified server is not an OpenVK-compatible instance. Try to choose another instance.
Unable to log in due to problems with a network. Please check your connection and try again.
Unable to sign in due to problems with a secure connection. Try to choose another instance.
You don\'t have any friend requests
Text has been copied to the clipboard
There are some problems with your network connection.
Android 2.3 or higher is required in order to view this video.
Your device can not play this video. Try selecting lower quality.
This profile was deleted or banned. Information on this profile is unavailable.
Receive notifications even outside the app
Refresh the news feed when you open application
You are about to leave a closed community. It may not be easy to come back. Leave community?
Are you sure you want to delete this topic? This action can not be undone.
Images can be loaded as soon as possible in conditions of low Internet speed.
The optimal quality has been selected for app working.
Allows you to see clearer, but does not save traffic and does not optimize the application.
Allows you to see even clearer, but does not save traffic and does not optimize the application.
This may cause the application to become unstable!
Load big photos in posts when using 3G
In order to upload multiple photos use Share menu in the Gallery app.
Do not disturb for an hour
Notifications will be enabled automatically at %s
Video file \"%s\" has been added to your page
wants to add you as a friend
Are you sure you want to delete this video file? This action can not be undone.
This link is not supported in the app
Are you sure you want to delete %s?
Are you sure you want to delete all saved audio files?
Application restart is required for this setting to take effect
These settings will take effect after restarting the application
Edit people & communities that are hidden from the news feed
News from this user are now hidden from your feed. You can restore them in settings.
News from this community are now hidden from your feed. You can restore them in settings.
News from this user are now be visible in your news feed.
News from this community are now be visible in your news feed.
Are you sure you want to remove this user from this chat?
You already have a OpenVK account on this device. If you wish to log in with another account, log out from current one first.
Link has been copied to the clipboard
The session is invalid. Please login again.
This profile has been temporarily suspended due to security concerns.
This user deleted their page. Information unavailable.
There is no information for this profile
Are you sure you want to delete this audio file from your profile?
This post will appear on your wall
This post will appear in your group
If you go back, your post will be lost.
Enter your account password to confirm.
Access token copied to clipboard. For security reasons do not show to third person!
Are you sure you want to leave this conversation?
You can add no more than %d attachments.
If you go back, your changes to this post will be lost.
Send first post to create a topic
You didn\'t exclude any sources from your newsfeed
This page doesn\'t exist. Probably it was deleted.
Are you sure you want to delete all messages in this chat? This action can\'t be undone.
Are you sure you want to delete this photo? This action can\'t be undone.
Enable this if you see black screen instead of video
This photo has been saved to \"Saved photos\".

Most likely, this instance uses an incompatible version of the OpenVK API, in which the necessary functions are not implemented or deprecated. Contact your system administrator or application developer to resolve the issue.
Unable to parse response from server
Enter the code provided by the code generating app.
At the moment this feature is not implemented. Stay tuned.
At the moment this feature is not supported. Stay tuned.
Wait for the load to finish and try again.
An error occurred while posting. Please try again later.
You are not allowed to post on this wall.
To send the log, enable USB debugging.
Use HttpUrlConnection wrapped HTTP(S) client designed for legacy versions of Android
Unable to turn off due to an unsupported Android version
Unable to turn on due to an unsupported Android version
Log saved to Device Memory/%1$s. Open in any file manager.
To save data to the Device Memory, application needs special permissions.\n\nOpen the \"About application\" system settings section?
To read data from Device Memory, application needs special permissions.\n\nOpen the \"About application\" system settings section?
Before posting, be sure to write something and repeat it again.
Not enough memory for image processing. Close all unused applications and try again.
Please enter all required authorization data and try again.
Silence in the local feed so far.\r\nYou can learn something new in the all news feed.
Sorry, but this client is incompatible with the VK API.
